TOCHome / Operations and Search Parameters

Operations and Search Parameters

The following search parameters have been defined for the Validated Healthcare Directory Implementation Guide. For more information on the FHIR RESTful search api and the standard Search Param Registry see the FHIR specification.

Search Parameter

Practitioner

  • qualification-issuer
  • identifier-assigner
  • qualification-status
  • qualification-wherevalid-location
  • qualification-wherevalid-code
  • endpoint
  • via-intermediary

Organization

  • coverage-area
  • qualification-status
  • qualification-code
  • qualification-wherevalid-location
  • qualification-wherevalid-code
  • qualification-issuer
  • via-intermediary

PractitionerRole

  • ​newPatients
  • qualification-status
  • qualification-code
  • qualification-wherevalid-location
  • qualification-wherevalid-code
  • qualification-issuer
  • network
  • via-intermediary

OrganizationRole

  • via-intermediary

HealthcareService

  • eligibility
  • coveragearea
  • identifier-assigner
  • newpatients
  • via-intermediary

Location

  • accessibility
  • newpatients
  • via-intermediary

CareTeam

  • member
  • organization
  • identifier-assigner
  • note-author
  • alias
  • location
  • service
  • endpoint
  • via-intermediary

Endpoint

  • identifier-assigner
  • usecase-type
  • usecase-standard
  • via-intermediary

VerificationResult

  • status
  • status-date
  • attestation-source
  • attestation-organization
  • attestation-method
  • primarysource-organization
  • primarysource-type
  • primarysource-date
  • validator-organization

ProductPlan

  • network
  • coverage-network
  • coverage-type
  • coverage-benefit-type
  • coverage-limit-value
  • plan-type
  • plan-identifier
  • plan-coveragearea
  • plan-network

  • general-costs-value
